channel.title: Player size
channel.description: Would it be possible to change the size of the player in a source mod, and if so, how would I go about doing that? The maps is too small, and rescaling them would fuck them up (I didn't make them, just trying to port).

item.title: Player size
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
It’s a direct port, as in, export from one, import into hammer, the textures are set up and everything.

Read full topic

item.title: Player size
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Think you’re gonna have to rescale, to avoid this in the future, always have an info_player_start nearby to refer to.

Read full topic
